summary: This mod simply adds the Nerevarine into Skyrim as a follower. He can be found in Whiterun at the Temple,
descriptionHtml: This mod adds The Nerevarine to Skyrim, making him a hefty companion to have. He uses a Absorb Health Enchanted Dwarven Warhammer and wears Banded Iron armor by default. He levels with the player, as not to make him too weak or powerful when you gain him. He also uses a premade voice module, so he doesn't have custom dialog or anything like Inigo.
author: Persona4Fan12
